posts.post_title: Looking to buy t206. My short list.
posts.post_content:
Looking to snag some Mordecai Brown Portraits in Raw or graded. 

Perry Lipe raw or graded 
Boss Schimdt raw or graded
Helm, J. Ross Raw or graded 
Mullaney, Dom raw or graded 
Kiernan, J.F. Raw or graded 

Any back works. Looking at a few back runs for fun. 

Send a Pm here or email to [url]derekalonzi@gmail.com[/url]
